tariff.title: Travel Pass
tariff.headline: Stay connected abroad.
tariff.description: per month / 24 months 100 minutes 250 texts 250 MB (in the UK) Purchase a Travel Pass for £20 to get 20 MB of data a day in Europe of pay £5 per MB.

tariff.title: O2 Stay in Touch
tariff.headline: Text and talk to your heart’s content.
tariff.description: per month / 24 months 600 minutes Unlimited texts 500 MB

tariff.title: The Everything Package
tariff.headline: Give your phone a bold plan.
tariff.description: per month / 24 months 300 minutes 300 texts Unlimited data Free handset

tariff.title: Vodafone Data Traveller
tariff.headline: Frequent travellers rejoice.
tariff.description: for Data Traveller - per month / 12 months 900 minutes Unlimited texts 500 MB (in the UK) Data Traveller £10 a month or £2 a day (Europe) £5 rest of the world

tariff.title: Orange Pay Monthly
tariff.headline: Talk and text a lot for a little.
tariff.description: per month / 24 months 300 minutes Unlimited texts 500 MB data

tariff.title: 3 Unlimited
tariff.headline: A phone with no boundaries.
tariff.description: per month / 24 months 2000 minutes 5000 texts Unlimited data
